K14amoghapu:3: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān potalake parvate viharati sma /
K14amoghapu:5: mahatā bhikṣusaṅghena sārdham aṣṭādaśabhir bhikṣusahasraiḥ navanavatibhiś ca bodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasraiḥ
K14amoghapu:6: anekaiś ca śuddhāvāsikāyikair devaputrakoṭiniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛta
K14amoghapu:7: īśvaro maheśvarabrahmakāyikadevaputrān adhikṛtya dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
K14amoghapu:8: atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ
K14amoghapu:9: kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ kṛtvā
K14amoghapu:10: praṇamya prahasitavadano bhūtvā bhagavantam etad avocat* /
K14amoghapu:11: asti mama bhagavan amoghapāśarājaṃ nāma hṛdayaṃ yan mayā pūrvam ekanavatikalpavilokitāyāṃ
K14amoghapu:12: lokadhātau lokendrarājatathāgatasya arhatsamyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśād udgrahītaṃ yena
K14amoghapu:14: īśvaro maheśvaradevaputrapramukhāni bahūni śuddhāvāsikāyikadevaputrapramukhāny anekadevaputraśatasahasrāṇi samādāpitāny anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau
K14amoghapu:16: yasmiṃś ca punar bhagavan pṛthivīpradeśe idam amoghapāśahṛdayaṃ pracaret* /
K14amoghapu:17: veditavyaṃ bhagavan tasmin pṛthivīpradeśe īśvaramaheśvarabrahmakāyikapramukhāni dvādaśadevaputraśatasahasrāṇi rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye sthāsyanti
K14amoghapu:18: caityasaṃmato bhagavan pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati yatredam amoghapāśahṛdayaṃ pracariṣyati /
K14amoghapu:21: yaḥ kaścid bhagavan kilviṣakārī syāt sarvapāpāspadaḥ pāpadharmasamācārī āryāpavādakaḥ
K14amoghapu:23: saced vipratisāraṃ gacched āyatyaṃ saṃvaram āpadyate /
K14amoghapu:24: tasyaiva tāvad bhagavan upavāsajāpena ihaiva janmani tat karma viśudhyati parikṣayaṃ gacchati nivartitaṃ bhavati /
K14amoghapu:25: ekāhikena jvareṇa dvyāhikena tryāhikena vā cāturthikena vā jvareṇa evaṃ saptāhikena vā jvareṇa /
K14amoghapu:26: akṣiśūlena vā dantaśūlena vā karṇaśūlena vā nāsāśūlena vā dantoṣṭhaśūlena vā jivhāśūlena
K14amoghapu:27: vā tāluśūlena vā hṛdayaśūlena vā udaraśūlena vā pārśvaśūlena vā kaṭiśūlena vā aṅgaśūlena
K14amoghapu:28: vā pratyaṅgaśūlena vā arśagrahaṇīśūlena vā atisāreṇa vā hastapādavedanayā vā śirorujā
K14amoghapu:31: saṃkṣepato bhagavan kāyapīḍayā vā cittapīḍayā vā dusvapnadarśanena vā tat karma parikṣayaṃ gacchati /
K14amoghapu:33: prāg eva śuddhasattvānāṃ śraddhādhimuktikānāṃ yadi bhagavan catasraḥ parṣadaś catvāro
K14amoghapu:34: varṇaḥ māyā imadhyanāpi ya idaṃ madīyam amoghapāśahṛdayaṃ śroṣyati udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati
K14amoghapu:35: vācayiṣyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati paryavāpsyati anyeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ śrāvayiṣyati
K14amoghapu:36: antas tiryagyonigatānāṃ vā sattvānāṃ karṇapūṭe sthitvā karṇajāpaṃ dāsyati /
K14amoghapu:38: apratikṣepataḥ arūpataḥ avikalpataḥ asaṃprabhavataḥ aciram agamataḥ akaraṇataḥ niḥkleśataḥ samacittanikṣepataḥ virahitapañcaskandhaḥ /
K14amoghapu:40: tad eṣāṃ daśabhyo digbhyo buddhasahasraṃ saṃmukhaṃ darśanaṃ kariṣyanti /
K14amoghapu:44: kiṃ bahunā bhagavann anyonyaspardhayā vā śroṣyati /
K14amoghapu:45: svāmibhayena vā parānuvṛttyā vā uccagghanahetunā vā śroṣyanti /
K14amoghapu:46: jñātavyaṃ bhagavan paṇḍitenāryāvalokiteśvarasyānubhāvena teṣāṃ karṇapuṭe sthitvā sa śabdo nipatiṣyati /
K14amoghapu:47: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kaścid eva puruṣaś candanaṃ vā karpūraṃ vā kesaraṃ vā kastūrikāṃ vā ākṛṣya paribhāṣya śilāyāṃ vā bhūmau vā piṣṭvā ātmānaṃ lepayet* /
K14amoghapu:48: na ca tasya candanasya karpūrasya kesarasya kastūrikāyāś caivaṃ bhavati anenāham ākṛṣṭaḥ paribhāṣito vā gandhenātikramiṣyāmīti /
K14amoghapu:50: evam eva bhagavann idaṃ madīyam amoghapāśahṛdayaṃ yaḥ kaścid uccaghana vā ullāpya /
K14amoghapu:53: teṣāṃ bhagavan khaṭukāṃ sattvānāṃ sa eva kuśalahetur bhaviṣyati /
K14amoghapu:54: yatra yatropapatsyante tatra tatra avirahitāś ca bhaviṣyanti śīlasamādhiprajñāpuṇyasaṃbhāragandhena /
K14amoghapu:56: yaḥ kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhikṣur vā bhikṣuṇī vā upāśako vā upāśikā vā tadanyo vā kaścit sattvaḥ amoghapāśahṛdayam uddiṣya śuklāṣṭamyām upavāsaṃ kuryāt* /
K14amoghapu:57: saptavārān amoghapāśahṛdayam anālāpataḥ āvartayet* tasya bhagavan dṛṣṭa eva dharmā viṃśatir anuśaṃsāḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyāḥ /
K14amoghapu:60: utpannāś cāsya rogāḥ karmavaśena śīghraṃ prasamaṃ yāsyanti /
K14amoghapu:71: saptavārān amoghapāśahṛdayena bhasmodakaṃ vā parijapya digvidig adha ūrdhvaś ca kṣetrasya bandho dātavyaḥ /
K14amoghapu:74: sarvasattvānāṃ ca priyo bhaviṣyati mana-āpaś ca bhaviṣyati /
K14amoghapu:76: utpannaś cāsya śatrubhayaṃ śīghraṃ praśamaṃ yāsyati /
K14amoghapu:78: na ca kākhordabhayaṃ na ca ḍākinībhayaṃ na ca tīvrāḥ kleśopakleśā bhaviṣyanti /
K14amoghapu:79: nāgninā na viṣeṇa na śastreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti /
K14amoghapu:80: yatra yatropapatsyante tatra tatrāvirahitāś ca bhaviṣyanti maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣayā /
K14amoghapu:84: maraṇakāle āryāvalokiteśvaro bhikṣurūpeṇa saṃmukhaṃ darśanaṃ dāsyati /
K14amoghapu:89: na pādavikṣepaṃ noccāraṃ na prasrāvaṃ na cārūḍhaḥ kālaṃ kariṣyati /
K14amoghapu:93: yatra yatra cāsya buddhakṣetre praṇidhis tatra tatropapattir bhaviṣyati /
K14amoghapu:95: dine dine trikālaṃ trīṇi vārān āvartayitavyam* /
K14amoghapu:97: ayaṃ cāmoghapāśahṛdayaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ balābalaṃ jñātvā śroṣayitavyaḥ /
K14amoghapu:99: yasmād dhi gate malamātsaryerṣyāpagato bodhisattvā bhavanti /
K14amoghapu:100: sattvānām arthakaraṇena bodhiḥ prāpyate bodhisattvānāṃ gaṇanāṃś ca gacchanti /
K14amoghapu:102: etau dvau dharmau sattvānām arthakaraṇenaiva prāpyete /
K14amoghapu:103: sacen me bhagavann anujānīyād yan nv aham imaṃ hṛdayaṃ tathāgatasya purataḥ kīrtaye catasṛṇāṃ parṣadām arthāya hitāya sukhāyānyeṣāṃ ca pāpakāriṇām*
K14amoghapu:104: atha khalu bhagavān āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam etad avocat* /
K14amoghapu:106: anumoditaṃ tathāgatena paścimakāle paścimasamaye bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pitṛkāryaṃ kariṣyati /
K14amoghapu:107: atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nimiṣanayano bhūtvā bhagavantam etad avocat* /
K14amoghapu:108: śṛṇu me bhagavan sarvabuddhabodhisattvanamaskṛtam idaṃ vimokṣamukhamaṇḍalaṃ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya vimokṣārthāya /
K14amoghapu:127: namaḥ śākyamunaye tathāgatāyārhate samyaksambuddhāya / tadyathā Ō
K14amoghapu:129: oṃ śame śame mahāśame rakṣa rakṣa māṃ sarvasattvāṃś ca sarvapāpaṃ praśamane svāhā /
K14amoghapu:140: smṛtivarddhani mativarddhani gativarddhani dhṛtivarddhani prajñāvarddhani pratibhānavarddhani dhyānavarddhani samādhivarddhani śamathavarddhani vipaśyanāvarddhani /
K14amoghapu:146: ebhyo namaskṛtvā idam āryāvalokiteśvaramukhodgīrṇam amoghapāśarājanāma hṛdayaṃ tathāgatasaṃmukhaṃ bhāṣitaṃ mahatparṣanmadhye 'ham idānīm āvartayiṣye
K14amoghapu:147: sidhyantu me mantrapadā sarvakāryāṇi sarvabhayebhyo mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca rakṣā bhavatu / tadyathā Ō
K14amoghapu:148: oṃ cara cara ciri ciri curu curu mara mara miri miri muru muru mahākāruṇika /
K14amoghapu:149: sara sara siri siri suru suru curu curu ciri ciri viri viri miri miri mahāpadmahasta /
K14amoghapu:150: kala kala kili kili kulu kulu mahāśuddhasattva /
K14amoghapu:151: buddhya buddhya bodha bodha bodhi bodhi bodhaya bodhaya kaṇa kaṇa kiṇi kiṇi kuṇu kuṇu paramaśuddhasattva /
K14amoghapu:152: kara kara kiri kiri kuru kuru mahāsthāmaprāpta /
K14amoghapu:153: cala cala saṃcala saṃcala vicala vicala pracala pracala eṭaṭa eṭaṭa bhara bhara bhiri bhiri bhuru bhuru tara tara tiri tiri turu turu ehy ehi mahākāruṇika /
K14amoghapu:155: dhara dhara dhiri dhiri dhuru dhuru tara tara sara sara cara cara para para vara vara mara mara lara lara hara hara hāhā hīhī hūhū oṃ kārabrahmaveśadhara
K14amoghapu:156: dhara dhara dhiri dhiri dhuru dhuru tara tara sara sara cara cara nara nara vara
K14amoghapu:157: vara hara hara raśmiśatasahasrapratimaṇḍitaśarīra jvala jvala tapa tapa bhāsa bhāsa
K14amoghapu:160: suru suru curu curu muru muru dhuru dhuru sanatkumārarudravāsavaviṣṇudhanadavāyvagni-ṛṣināyakavināyakabahuvividhaveśadhara /
K14amoghapu:161: dhara dhara dhiri dhiri dhuru dhuru tara tara thara thara dhara dhara para para lara lara hara hara yara yara sara sara vara vara varadāyaka
K14amoghapu:163: muhu muhu muru muru muya muya muñca muñca rakṣa rakṣa māṃ sarvasattvāṃś ca sarvabhayebhyaḥ
K14amoghapu:164: sarvopadravebhyaḥ sarvopasargebhyaḥ sarvagrahebhyaḥ sarvavyādhibhyaḥ sarvaviṣebhyaḥ sarvajvarebhyaḥ /
K14amoghapu:166: kaṇa kaṇa kiṇi kiṇi kuṇu kuṇu cara cara ciri ciri curu curu indriyabalabodhyaṃgacaturāryasatyasaṃprakāśaka /
K14amoghapu:167: tapa tapa tama tama dama dama śama śama masa masa dhama dhama mahākāruṇika mahātamondhakāravidhamanaṣaṭpāramitāparipūraka /
K14amoghapu:168: mala mala mili mili mulu mulu ṭaṭa ṭaṭa ṭhaṭha ṭhaṭha ṭiṭi ṭiṭi ṭhiṭhi ṭhiṭhi ṭuṭu ṭuṭu ṭhuṭhu ṭhuṭhu eṇeyacarmakṛtaparikara ehy ehi mahākāruṇika
K14amoghapu:170: kara kara kiri kiri kuru kuru para para hara hara (AphSū 167)
K14amoghapu:171: vara vara sara sara mara mara kara kara kaṭa kaṭa kiṭi kiṭi kuṭu kuṭu maṭa maṭa mahāviśuddhaviṣayanivāsina mahākāruṇika /
K14amoghapu:189: idaṃ ca me karma kuru namo 'stu te svāhā /
K14amoghapu:190: oṃ raṇa raṇa hūṃ phaṭ* svāhā /
K14amoghapu:192: oṃ jra jiṃ juṃ phaṭ* svāha /
K14amoghapu:194: oṃ hrīḥ trailokyavijayāmoghapāśāpratihata hrīḥ haḥ hūṃ phaṭ* svāhā /
K14amoghapu:198: oṃ ārolik* hrīḥ hrīḥ hūṃ phaṭ* svāhā /
K14amoghapu:199: niyatāniyatavedanīyāśubhasya me bhagavan karmaṇo 'śeṣataḥ parikṣayaṃ kuru svāhā /
K14amoghapu:205: agarudhūpena sīmābandhaḥ bhasmodakena sarṣapakhadirakīlakādyaiḥ sarvajvareṣu sūtrakaṃ bandhayitavyam* /
K14amoghapu:208: udaraśūlena lavaṇodakaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ mṛttikayā udakena vā /
K14amoghapu:211: sīmābandhaṃ pañcaraṅgikasūtram ekaviṃśativārān parijapya caturṣu khadirakīlakeṣu baddhvā caturdiśaṃ nikhātavyaṃ sīmābandho bhaviṣyati /
K14amoghapu:215: cakṣuroge gandhodakapalāśodakaṃ madhuyaṣṭyudakaṃ vā sarvakalikalahavivādebhyaḥ abhyākhyāneṣūdakaṃ parijapya mukhaṃ prakṣālayitavyam* /
K14amoghapu:216: paraviṣayarājyopadravarāṣṭrakeṣu pūrṇakalaśaṃ sthāpayitvā śucinā śucivastraprāvṛtena mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā vācayitavyaṃ mahāśāntir bhavati /
K14amoghapu:217: tena codakena sektavyaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ rakṣā kṛtā bhavati /
K14amoghapu:219: mudritāṃ candanatilakaṃ hṛdaye ekaviṃśativārān parijapya kartavyaṃ sarvānantaryāṇi kṣayaṃ yānti /
K14amoghapu:223: jayāvijayā-aparājitā nākulī gandhanākūlī dhāraṇī abhayapāṇi indriyapāṇigandhapriyaṃgutagaracakrā mahācakrā vikrāntāsomarājī sunandā ceti /
K14amoghapu:224: yathā saṃbhavata aṣṭottaraśatavārān parijapya maṇiṃ kṛtvā śirasi bāhau vā dhārayitavyam* /
K14amoghapu:225: bālānāṃ gale nārīṇāṃ vilagne svayaṃ paraṃ saubhāgyakaram* /
K14amoghapu:227: etena maṇinā baddhena sarvarakṣā kṛtā bhavati /
K14amoghapu:229: utpannāpi na pīḍāṃ janayiṣyati śīghraṃ praśamayiṣyanti /
K14amoghapu:230: grahān praśamayiṣyati vātameghāśanistambhanaṃ vāriṇā karavīralatayā sarvakarmakaram* /
K14amoghapu:231: āryāvalokiteśvarahṛdayaṃ paramasiddham asādhitam ete tāni karmāṇi kurute /
K14amoghapu:232: atha sādhayitum icchan vidhiḥ paṭe 'śeṣakair varṇakair buddhapratimālikhyāryāvalokiteśvaro
K14amoghapu:236: tataḥ sādhakena tasyāgrato 'patitagomayena maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā śvetapuṣpāvakīrṇam aṣṭāu gandhodakapūrṇakumbhāḥ sthāpayitavyāḥ /
K14amoghapu:239: ahorātroṣitena vā trirātroṣitena vā triśuklabhojitā vā trikālasnāpayitā śucivastraprāvṛto bhūtvā jāpo dātavyaḥ /
K14amoghapu:240: tataḥ pratimāyā agrataḥ ātmānaṃ ca likhitaṃ paśyati taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca prahṛṣyati yāvat svayam evāryāvalokiteśvara āgacchati /
K14amoghapu:242: manaḥśilāñjanaṃ vā parijapya akṣiṇy aṃjayitvā tato 'ntarhito bhavati /
K14amoghapu:245: yad icchati tat karoty eva sādhaka iti /
K14amoghapu:246: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanā āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvas te ca bhikṣavas
K14amoghapu:247: te ca bodhisattvās te śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko
